trans-unit.note: First bullet point with a specific update in 2.25
trans-unit.source: On iOS, enhanced stability and reliability for VPN connections.
trans-unit.target: Nni iOS, na megghiu stabbilità e affidabbilità pî cunnissioni VPN.

trans-unit.note: Second bullet point with a specific update in 2.25
trans-unit.source: On Android, added step-by-step instructions to enable VPN connection on startup.
trans-unit.target: Nni Android, foru agghiunciuti istruzzioni passu a passu pi abbilitari a cunnissioni VPN quannu s’abbìa u tilèfunu.

trans-unit.note: First bullet point with a specific update in 2.27
trans-unit.source: Dark mode — enjoy a sleek new look that’s easy on the eyes, day or night.
trans-unit.target: Mudalità scura — scopri n’aspettu novu chi arrisurta leggiu pi l’occhi, di jornu o di notti.

trans-unit.source: Download update
trans-unit.target: Scàrrica l’attualizzu

trans-unit.note: Alternative title used for some versions. %1 is replaced by the version number, such as 2.24
trans-unit.source: Download the new Mozilla VPN %1
trans-unit.target: Scàrrica u novu Mozilla VPN %1

trans-unit.note: Default update text before several bullet points with specific updates
trans-unit.source: This update includes minor bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements, including:
trans-unit.target: St’attualizzu nchiuji abbirsatini sicunnari, canci â ntirfaccia utenti e autri ammigghiurìi di pristazzioni, a tipu:

trans-unit.source: This update includes minor bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements.
trans-unit.target: St’attualizzu nchiuji abbirsatini sicunnari, canci â ntirfaccia utenti e autri ammigghiurìi di pristazzioni.

trans-unit.source: Get help
trans-unit.target: Fatti ajutari

trans-unit.note: Subtitle for default What's New message
trans-unit.source: You’re using the latest version of Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.target: Stai usannu l’ùrtima virsioni di Mozilla VPN.

trans-unit.source: We’ve released an updated version of Mozilla VPN! Update to the latest version for the best possible Mozilla VPN experience.
trans-unit.target: Pubblicammu na virsioni nova di Mozilla VPN! Attualizza a l’ùrtima virsioni pâ megghiu spirienza pussìbbili cu Mozilla VPN.

trans-unit.source: Update now
trans-unit.target: Attualizza ora

trans-unit.note: Title for update message. %1 is replaced by the version number, such as 2.24
trans-unit.source: Update to Mozilla VPN %1
trans-unit.target: Attualizza a Mozilla VPN %1

trans-unit.note: Closing for default What's New message
trans-unit.source: Thank you for installing the latest version!
trans-unit.target: Grazzi chi ti nzitasti l’ùrtima virsioni!

trans-unit.note: Title for What's New message. %1 is replaced by the version number, such as 2.25
trans-unit.source: You’ve updated to Mozilla VPN %1
trans-unit.target: Attualizzasti a Mozilla VPN %1

trans-unit.source: Turn off VPN for specific websites
trans-unit.target: Sdisattiva a VPN pi siti spicìfici

trans-unit.source: Set different locations for different websites, to see the web as you prefer
trans-unit.target: Mposta pusizzioni diversi pi siti diversi, pi navicari ’n riti comu prifirisci

trans-unit.source: Keep protection for Firefox on, even when the Mozilla VPN app is off
trans-unit.target: Manteni a prutizzioni pi Firefox attiva, macari quannu l’app Mozilla VPN è sdisattiva

trans-unit.source: Download Firefox
trans-unit.target: Scàrrica Firefox

trans-unit.note: Final 'call to action' line of message
trans-unit.source: Not using Firefox to browse? Give it a try.
trans-unit.target: Nun usi Firefox pi navicari? Pròvalu.

trans-unit.source: Get the extension
trans-unit.target: Nzìtati u stinneriu

trans-unit.source: Personalize your VPN protections to meet your web browsing needs.
trans-unit.target: Pirsunalizza i to prutizzioni VPN pi rispùnniri ê to nicissità di navicazzioni.

trans-unit.source: Try the Firefox extension
trans-unit.target: Prova u stinneriu pi Firefox

trans-unit.source: VPN for secure, private browsing
trans-unit.target: VPN pi na navicazzioni privata e sicura

trans-unit.source: Relay’s unlimited email masks to prevent spam and trackers
trans-unit.target: Nnirizzi di posta mascarati senza finaiti di Relay pi prutiggìriti dû spam e dî trazzatura

trans-unit.source: Monitor’s protection from data brokers who sell your info online
trans-unit.target: Monitor pi prutiggìriti di chiḍḍi chi vìnninu i to dati

trans-unit.source: Plan includes:
trans-unit.target: U chianu cumprenni:

trans-unit.note: First line of message. The %1 variable is replaced with the price of the bundle.
trans-unit.source: For %1/month, get our privacy tools in one plan.
trans-unit.target: Pi %1 ô misi, pigghia tutti i nostri stigghi pâ privatizza nnôn chianu sulu.

trans-unit.source: 3 tools, 1 privacy plan — VPN, email masking, and data protection
trans-unit.target: 3 stigghi, 1 chianu di privatizza — VPN, màscari di posta elittrònica e prutizzioni dî dati

trans-unit.source: Upgrade
trans-unit.target: Attualizza
